name: Bot Street Fight B
description:
Developer
  • My Apps: Brad App List
  • My YouTube Channel: Brad Code Tips
Features
  • Maps: City Street
  • Slow motion
Game Menu Menu
Esc/Ctrl + MResetCtrl + RToggle Post Process AA Quality 2/3Num - Player Menu WASDMoveSpaceJumpSprintLeft ShiftFireRMBZoomLMB Description
  • This is a cinematic experience that is mostly non-interactive.
  • Watch the action from any angle as if you are part of a movie in this realistic city street scene with police fighting a robot that has run amok.
  • This is not intended to be a polished game so for example you can fall off the map in some places.
Directions
  • The gun fires a projectile that doesn't do any damage but can move some objects.
Notes
  • BotStreetFightB is based on the Unreal Engine 4 "Showdown VR Demo"; however, BotStreetFightB is a ready to play game that doesn't need to be built from source. BotStreetFightB complies with all legal requirements to use Unreal Engine 4 assets.
  • BotStreetFightA works with VR and BotStreetFightB works with a keyboard & mouse. 
Version 1.0
  • Known Bug: None.
Technical
  • Unreal Engine Version 4.11.2
  • 4.11 and 4.23 used different versions of Showdown VR Demo. I used 4.11 because 4.23 would not load.
Design
  • This game is based on Unreal Engine 4 Showdown VR Demo. 
Feedback

What did you like or dislike? Any feedback is appreciated.

Install Instructions

Download the ZIP file, unzip, and run the EXE file. No install is required.
